system.description:
“Wandering Keris.” Other nations might have the pewter staff as a symbol of announcing a sage's presence, but the grand Concordant Sages of the Sword Isles perform rituals and scare off predatory animals with a galakeris, Wandering Dagger, a usually sheathed keris decorated with bells and tassels.

Effect: All squares close to you are considered Dangerous Terrain for all enemies.

Path of Concordance Set (1/3): When you spend 2-3 Beats on a single Technique, gain Overwhelming on your next Attack.
